https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.name: device

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/metadat.name: metadataLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/oscilla._instruction: Enter the oscillation amplitude of the blade from the slicing device during its use.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/oscilla.name: oscillationAmplitude

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/sliceTh._instruction: Enter the defined slice thickness during the use of this slicing device.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/sliceTh.label: Slice thickness
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/sliceTh.name: sliceThickness

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/slicing._instruction: Enter all slicing angles (intentional or unintentional) in relation to the slicing plane used during this activity.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/slicing.name: slicingAngle

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/slicing._instruction: Add the anatomical plane that best describes the slicing direction of the tissue sample(s) during the use of this slicing device.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/slicing.name: slicingPlane

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/slicing._instruction: Enter the defined slicing speed during the use of this slicing device.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/slicing.label: Slicing speed
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/slicing.name: slicingSpeed

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/usedSpe._instruction: Add the state of the tissue sample or subject that this device was used on.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/usedSpe.label: Used specimen
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/usedSpe.name: usedSpecimen

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/vibrati._instruction: Enter the defined vibration frequency during the use of this slicing device.
